private_directory.name: Amazon DSP (Delivery Service Partner)
private_directory.description: Start your own delivery business with Amazon. DSP owners manage teams of drivers delivering Amazon packages. Requires $10K liquid capital minimum. Multi-year contract with guaranteed volume.
private_directory.requirements: Business entity, $10K+ liquid capital, pass background check
private_directory.contract_model: Dedicated multi-year service contract with guaranteed route volume

private_directory.name: FedEx Ground ISP (Independent Service Provider)
private_directory.description: Own and operate FedEx Ground delivery routes. ISP model allows owning multiple routes and managing driver teams. Long-term contracted routes with defined territories.
private_directory.requirements: Business entity, significant capital investment, fleet of vehicles
private_directory.contract_model: Exclusive territory contract with annual renewal and route ownership

private_directory.name: Modivcare (formerly Providence Service Corp)
private_directory.description: Major NEMT broker operating in Massachusetts. Contracts with Medicaid/Medicare plans for non-emergency medical transportation. Seeking qualified transport providers for ongoing contracted service.
private_directory.requirements: Licensed NEMT provider, compliant vehicles, trained drivers, insurance
private_directory.contract_model: Provider network contract with guaranteed trip volume by zone

private_directory.name: MTM Inc
private_directory.description: National NEMT broker managing transportation for health plans. Active in Massachusetts Medicaid transportation network. Offers multi-year provider contracts with steady volume.
private_directory.requirements: Licensed NEMT provider, compliant vehicles, background checks, insurance
private_directory.contract_model: Annual provider agreement with territory-based trip assignments

private_directory.name: Veyo
private_directory.description: Technology-driven NEMT platform. Connects qualified drivers with non-emergency medical transport rides. Offers both individual driver and fleet provider contracts in MA.
private_directory.requirements: Valid license, 4-door vehicle, smartphone, background check
private_directory.contract_model: Fleet provider contract with dedicated service area or per-trip basis

private_directory.name: XPO Logistics
private_directory.description: Partner with XPO for last-mile, LTL, and truckload freight opportunities. Independent contractor and fleet owner contract programs with dedicated lanes.
private_directory.requirements: CDL, commercial vehicle, insurance, MC/DOT authority
private_directory.contract_model: Dedicated lane contracts and fleet owner agreements

private_directory.name: Uber Freight
private_directory.description: Book and manage freight loads through Uber Freight platform. For carriers and owner-operators with CDL and commercial vehicles. Offers dedicated lane contracts.
private_directory.requirements: CDL, commercial vehicle, MC/DOT authority
private_directory.earning_potential: Varies by load and lane; dedicated contracts $100K-$300K+
private_directory.contract_model: Dedicated lane contracts and spot market loads

private_directory.name: MV Transportation
private_directory.description: Largest private provider of paratransit services in the US. Operates MBTA The RIDE and other MA transit contracts. Actively seeks subcontractors for fixed-route and demand-response service.
private_directory.requirements: Licensed transport provider, ADA-compliant vehicles, trained drivers
private_directory.contract_model: Multi-year subcontract agreements with guaranteed trip minimums

private_directory.name: National Express Transit (NEXT)
private_directory.description: Major transit management company operating in MA. Manages fixed-route, paratransit, and shuttle contracts. Seeks subcontractors and independent fleet owners for contract work.
private_directory.requirements: Licensed provider, compliant vehicles, DOT compliance
private_directory.contract_model: Subcontract agreements under municipal and regional transit authority contracts

private_directory.name: First Transit
private_directory.description: One of the largest private-sector transit management companies. Operates campus, corporate, and municipal shuttle contracts across MA. Seeking fleet subcontractors.
private_directory.requirements: Licensed transport operator, commercial vehicles, insurance
private_directory.contract_model: Annual and multi-year shuttle and transit management subcontracts

private_directory.name: Northeast Medical Transport Alliance
private_directory.description: Regional NEMT provider cooperative serving Massachusetts hospitals and health systems. Coordinates contracted medical transport between facilities, rehab centers, and dialysis clinics.
private_directory.requirements: Licensed NEMT provider, HIPAA compliance, wheelchair-accessible vehicles
private_directory.contract_model: Annual service agreements with hospital systems and health plans

private_directory.name: Global Medical Response (AMR)
private_directory.description: AMR/Global Medical Response operates non-emergency medical transport in Massachusetts. Contracts with health systems, insurers, and municipalities. Seeks qualified NEMT subcontractors.
private_directory.requirements: Licensed NEMT provider, EMT-trained staff, compliant fleet
private_directory.contract_model: Multi-year subcontract with service level agreements and performance bonuses

private_directory.name: Partners Healthcare / Mass General Brigham Transport
private_directory.description: Mass General Brigham (formerly Partners Healthcare) operates inter-campus shuttle and patient transport across 16+ facilities in Greater Boston. RFPs for contracted transport vendors issued periodically.
private_directory.requirements: Commercial transport license, ADA-compliant fleet, healthcare transport experience
private_directory.contract_model: Multi-year service contract with annual renewal options

private_directory.name: Boston University / BU Shuttle Contract
private_directory.description: Boston University operates an extensive campus shuttle system connecting Charles River, Medical Campus, and Fenway areas. Periodically contracts out shuttle operations to private transport vendors.
private_directory.requirements: Licensed commercial transport operator, ADA fleet, DOT compliance
private_directory.contract_model: Annual campus shuttle operations contract with multi-year option

private_directory.name: Harvard University Shuttle Services
private_directory.description: Harvard operates shuttle routes across Cambridge, Allston, and Longwood campuses. Transport vendor contracts for evening/weekend shuttle, inter-campus routes, and event transport.
private_directory.requirements: Licensed commercial operator, CDL drivers, GPS-equipped fleet
private_directory.contract_model: Multi-year operations contract with performance metrics

private_directory.name: MIT Campus Shuttle & Transport
private_directory.description: MIT contracts shuttle and transport services between Cambridge campus, Lincoln Lab, and other facilities. Includes regular scheduled routes and on-demand research team transport.
private_directory.requirements: Licensed operator, security clearance for Lincoln Lab routes, commercial fleet
private_directory.contract_model: Annual contract with optional renewal periods

private_directory.name: Massport (Logan Airport Ground Transport)
private_directory.description: Massachusetts Port Authority contracts ground transportation services at Logan Airport including hotel shuttles, rental car transport, employee shuttles, and cargo handling transport.
private_directory.requirements: Licensed commercial transport, TSA compliance, airport-rated vehicles
private_directory.contract_model: Multi-year concession and service agreements through public bid process

private_directory.name: Biogen / Biotech Campus Shuttle Contracts
private_directory.description: Biogen and other MA biotech companies (Moderna, Sanofi, Takeda) contract employee shuttle services between Cambridge/Boston campuses, parking facilities, and transit stations.
private_directory.requirements: Licensed commercial transport, corporate insurance minimums, GPS fleet tracking
private_directory.contract_model: Annual corporate shuttle contract with defined routes and schedules

private_directory.name: GATRA (Greater Attleboro Taunton Regional Transit)
private_directory.description: Regional transit authority serving southeastern MA. Contracts demand-response paratransit, dial-a-ride, and fixed-route service to private operators. Regular RFP cycles.
private_directory.requirements: Licensed transit provider, ADA vehicles, drug testing program
private_directory.contract_model: Multi-year service contract with regional transit authority

private_directory.name: MWRTA (MetroWest Regional Transit Authority)
private_directory.description: MetroWest RTA contracts demand-response and fixed-route transit services in the Framingham/Natick/Marlborough corridor. Seeks private operators for paratransit and shuttle service.
private_directory.requirements: Licensed transit operator, ADA-compliant fleet, trained drivers
private_directory.contract_model: Annual operations contract with multi-year renewal option

private_directory.name: CATA (Cape Ann Transportation Authority)
private_directory.description: Cape Ann TA contracts fixed-route and demand-response services on the North Shore. Private operators provide vehicles and drivers under contracted service agreements.
private_directory.requirements: Licensed provider, commercial fleet, FTA compliance
private_directory.contract_model: Service contract with regional transit authority funding

private_directory.name: Quest Diagnostics Courier Network (MA)
private_directory.description: Quest Diagnostics contracts medical specimen courier services across Massachusetts. Dedicated daily routes picking up samples from clinics, hospitals, and physician offices for delivery to labs.
private_directory.requirements: Commercial vehicle, OSHA training, DOT medical card, clean driving record
private_directory.contract_model: Dedicated route contract with daily scheduled pickups and guaranteed volume

private_directory.name: LabCorp Courier Services (MA)
private_directory.description: LabCorp contracts independent courier operators for medical specimen transport across Massachusetts. Scheduled routes with defined pickup points and lab delivery destinations.
private_directory.requirements: Cargo van/vehicle, OSHA compliance, specimen handling training
private_directory.contract_model: Annual route contract with defined territory and pickup schedule

private_directory.name: CVS Health / Omnicare Pharmacy Delivery (MA)
private_directory.description: CVS Health / Omnicare contracts pharmacy delivery services to nursing homes, assisted living facilities, and long-term care facilities across Massachusetts. Scheduled daily routes.
private_directory.requirements: Licensed delivery vehicle, pharmacy delivery certification, HIPAA compliance
private_directory.contract_model: Annual pharmacy delivery contract with guaranteed facility routes

private_directory.name: Elder Services of Merrimack Valley
private_directory.description: Area Agency on Aging contracts transportation services for seniors and disabled residents in the Merrimack Valley. Title III-B funded transport with guaranteed trip volumes.
private_directory.requirements: ADA-accessible vehicles, CORI checks, elder care training
private_directory.contract_model: Annual service contract funded through federal Older Americans Act

private_directory.name: WestMass ElderCare Transportation
private_directory.description: Area Agency on Aging serving western MA. Contracts transportation for seniors to medical appointments, adult day programs, and essential services. Seeking transport vendor partners.
private_directory.requirements: ADA vehicles, trained drivers, elder care sensitivity training
private_directory.contract_model: Annual contract with trip-based reimbursement and guaranteed minimums

private_directory.name: South Shore Hospital / South Shore Health Transport
private_directory.description: South Shore Health system contracts patient and inter-facility transport services between its hospital, clinics, and rehabilitation centers in the South Shore region.
private_directory.requirements: Licensed medical transport, wheelchair-accessible vehicles, HIPAA compliance
private_directory.contract_model: Multi-year patient transport service agreement

private_directory.name: UMass Memorial Health Transport Services
private_directory.description: UMass Memorial Health operates across central MA with multiple campuses. Contracts inter-facility shuttle and patient transport between Worcester, Marlborough, and Clinton campuses.
private_directory.requirements: Commercial transport license, healthcare experience, ADA fleet
private_directory.contract_model: Annual inter-facility transport contract with performance guarantees

private_directory.name: Boston Convention & Exhibition Center (MCCA)
private_directory.description: Massachusetts Convention Center Authority contracts shuttle and ground transport for conventions and events at BCEC, Hynes, and MassMutual Center. High-volume seasonal contract work.
private_directory.requirements: Licensed commercial transport, large fleet capacity, event logistics experience
private_directory.contract_model: Annual preferred vendor contract with per-event task orders

private_directory.name: Brookline/Newton Senior Transport
private_directory.description: Municipal senior transport programs in Brookline and Newton contract private operators for door-to-door senior transportation including medical, shopping, and social trips.
private_directory.requirements: Wheelchair-accessible vehicle, CORI check, sensitivity training
private_directory.contract_model: Annual municipal contract with town funding
